item.title: State Solutions Early Learning Overview
item.dc:creator: Tiffani LeClair
item.description:
Learn how the MAP Suite early learning solution from NWEA can support your state’s commitment to helping students in grades K–3 learn to read proficiently and develop early math skills.

The post State Solutions Early Learning Overview appeared first on NWEA.
item.content:encoded:
Learn how the MAP Suite early learning solution from NWEA can support your state’s commitment to helping students in grades K–3 learn to read proficiently and develop early math skills.

The post State Solutions Early Learning Overview appeared first on NWEA.

item.title: State Solutions Technical Fact Sheet
item.dc:creator: Tiffani LeClair
item.description:
NWEA partners with states to fulfill the promise of the Every Student Succeeds Act (ESSA) by creating innovative assessment solutions that reveal multiple dimensions of student success and promote learning.

The post State Solutions Technical Fact Sheet appeared first on NWEA.
item.content:encoded:
NWEA partners with states to fulfill the promise of the Every Student Succeeds Act (ESSA) by creating innovative assessment solutions that reveal multiple dimensions of student success and promote learning.

The post State Solutions Technical Fact Sheet appeared first on NWEA.
